item.title: Focus Money awards spritpreise.jetzt
item.description:
We are delighted to announce that spritpreise.jetzt has received an award in the current issue of Focus Money magazine (issue 30/2025)!

In the comprehensive study “Best Online Portals”, which was carried out by the analysis and consulting institute Service Value on behalf of Focus Money, users gave us a top rating in the “Fuel Cost Comparison” category.

This award means a great deal to us, as it is based directly on the opinions of over 94,000 consumers. Only portals that perform better than the overall average of all providers assessed within their sector receive a “top score” award.

item.title: Spritpreise: Implementing a price alarm backend
item.description:
Spritpreise has recently a Price Alarm feature, that sends push notifications based on a personal price threshold. In this blog post, I’ll explain some of the technical details and considerations that went into the implementation.

The API

The price alarm is handled by a new application and API that I have implemented based on the Spring Boot / Kotlin stack. It uses a database to store the configured price alarms, stations as well as the Firebase Cloud Messaging push token.

item.title: Spritpreise: Price alarm now available
item.description:
Spritpreise has received a useful new feature – the Price Alarm! Starting now, you can set a personal price threshold for your favorite gas stations. If the price for Super E5, E10, or Diesel drops below this value, you’ll automatically receive a push notification directly to your smartphone.

You’re on vacation or have recently filled up? No worries, pause the price alarm with one simple click for a few hours or days - until you need it again.
